title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma…) behind a REST/OpenAI-compatible API with one-line install.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, embed, pull, list models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter giving Ollama models first-class support for chains, agents, retrieval, tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (like ChatGPT) that talks to any local Ollama model; no external services.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL and CLI toolbox (chat, benchmark, batch prompts) written in Go.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like pair programmer.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG stack: Ollama + Chroma + LangChain + Streamlit to chat with your documents.

title: ollama-nvidia-trt
summary: Upstream PR adding optional TensorRT-LLM backend for 2-3× faster inference on RTX/Ada GPUs.

title: ollama-mistral-ft
summary: Official Mistral fine-tune adapter; drop-in replacement so Ollama can serve custom Mistral 7B MoE models.

title: ollama-bench
summary: Community benchmark suite (prompts/second, TTFT, memory) across GPUs & models.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into your server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger CI module to spin up Ollama service containers for integration tests without GPUs.

title: ollama4j
summary: Lightweight Java SDK (Maven) for Ollama covering chat, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library plus Blazor demo showing how to chat with local LLMs from C#.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-gui-fluid
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for Ollama with markdown, code copy, and dark mode.

title: reddit/r/ollama – weekly model discussion
summary: Active community thread comparing quality & speed of newly uploaded GGUFs in Ollama library.
